portInfoTable.name: portInfoTable
portInfoTable.description: A table indexed by ifIndex of a port. This can be a font-panel/module port e.g. 101 or an aggregator 15512.

portInfoEgressVlans.name: portInfoEgressVlans
portInfoEgressVlans.description: The set of vlans on which this port is allowed to transmit traffic.

portInfoForbiddenEgressVlans.name: portInfoForbiddenEgressVlans
portInfoForbiddenEgressVlans.description: The set of vlans on which this port is forbidden to transmit.

portInfoUntaggedVlans.name: portInfoUntaggedVlans
portInfoUntaggedVlans.description: The set of vlans on which this port transmits untagged frames.

portInfoStpPortPriority.name: portInfoStpPortPriority
portInfoStpPortPriority.description: The value of the priority field which is contained in the first (in network byte order) octet of the (2 octet long) Port ID. The other octet of the Port ID is given by the value of dot1dStpPort..

portInfoStpPortEnable.name: portInfoStpPortEnable
portInfoStpPortEnable.description: The enabled/disabled status of the port.

portInfoPvid.name: portInfoPvid
portInfoPvid.description: The PVID, the VLAN ID assigned to untagged frames or Prority-Tagged frames received on this port.

portInfoAcceptableFrameTypes.name: portInfoAcceptableFrameTypes
portInfoAcceptableFrameTypes.description: When this is admitOnlyVlanTagged(2) the device will discard untagged frames or Prority-Tagged frames received on this port. When admitAll(1), untagged frames or Prority-Tagged frames received on this port will be accepted and assigned to the PVID for this port. This control does not affect VLAN independent BPDU frames, such as GVRP and STP. It does affect VLAN dependent BPDU frames, such as GMRP.

portInfoIngressFiltering.name: portInfoIngressFiltering
portInfoIngressFiltering.description: When this is true(1) the device will discard incoming frames for VLANs which do not include this Port in its Member set. When false(2), the port will accept all incoming frames. This control does not affect VLAN independent BPDU frames, such as GVRP and STP. It does affect VLAN dependent BPDU frames, such as GMRP.

portInfoFdbTable.name: portInfoFdbTable
portInfoFdbTable.description: This table contains the static unicast addresses for each port in the bridge.

portInfoFdbEntry.name: portInfoFdbEntry
portInfoFdbEntry.description: Information about a specific unicast MAC address.

portInfoFdbIndex.name: portInfoFdbIndex
portInfoFdbIndex.description: This contains the ifIndex of the port that this address has been seen on.

portInfoFdbVlan.name: portInfoFdbVlan
portInfoFdbVlan.description: The Vlan index of the port.

portInfoFdbAddress.name: portInfoFdbAddress
portInfoFdbAddress.description: This object contains the unicast MAC address of the entry.

portInfoFdbStatus.name: portInfoFdbStatus
portInfoFdbStatus.description: This has useful states of active, destroy, and createAndGo. An fdb entry can be created with a state of createAndGo or active. The fdb entry can be deleted by setting the state to destroy.
